thread.section_title: Lookupfare Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lookupfare | lookupfare.com
thread.title: Ishaye

author: Ishaye
title: Ishaye
text: Outstanding service..Mr. Mike Watson really took great care of a situation that I thought was gonna hurt my family ..So ,my father book his and my mother tickets to come and visit my family and I here in Florida we have not seen each other since July..So there was a mix up with Daddy name and birth date on the ticket and We thought we wasn't gonna be able to fine the same deal for the same dates....but MIKE WATSON made it happened ,he explained to every detail and helped be rebook my parents stay,,I was so emotion his morning when I first called and Mr.Watson if your reading this I sincerely apologize. And Thanks for the GREAT SERVICE!!!
